name: Flush Rush (slammed)
description:
That dreadful long walk when you wake up needing the toilet in the middle of the night, it's awful. Flush Rush is a play on how long that walk feels where you need to "rush" through levels to make it to the toilet in time.

This light hearted first person platformer is designed to be frustrating enough to make you shout "Crap!", but addicting enough to make you keep hitting that retry button.

Solo developed in 4 months for a University project.

Controls:

  • WASD- Movement
  • Shift- Fart Dash
  • Ctrl- Slide
  • Space- Jump
